Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lizardtech.djvu.DjVuObject

        • com.lizardtech.djvu.anno.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DjVuInterface, Hyperlink

    public class Line
extends Rect
    Implements line map areas.
